cause.description:
Those held in the Guantanamo Bay should be released unless they are to be charged and tried in accordance with international standards of fair trial. No detainees who are released should be forcibly sent to their country of origin or other countries where they may face serious human rights abuses. Indeed, it is crucial that emptying and closing down the Guantánamo camp not result in a transfer of the human rights violations elsewhere.
http://denouncetorture.amnestyusa.org/site/c.huITL9MVJxE/b.1833863/k.4777/A_framework_for_closing_Guantnamo.htm
1. Condemn torture and other ill-treatment
2. Ensure access to prisoners
3. No secret detention
4. Provide safeguards during detention and interrogation
5. Abide by the Genva Conventions
6. Either charge the prisoners with a crime and allow them a fair trial or realese them.
cause.mission: Close Guantanamo Bay and end U.S. Sponsored Torture
cause.name: Close Guantanamo Bay
